unnormalised: New Delhi: The Ministry of Culture has announced the tentative schedule for the Republic Day celebrations 2025. The main parade at Rajpath is scheduled for 26/01/2025, commencing at 09:00 hrs IST. Preparations are already underway, with rehearsals planned throughout December '24 and January '25. A full dress rehearsal will be held on 23/01/2025.
normalised: New Delhi: The Ministry of Culture has announced the tentative schedule for the Republic Day celebrations two thousand and twenty five. The main parade at Rajpath is scheduled for twenty sixth January two thousand and twenty five, commencing at zero nine zero zero hours I-S-T. Preparations are already underway, with rehearsals planned throughout December twenty four and January twenty five. A full dress rehearsal will be held on twenty third January two thousand and twenty five.

unnormalised: The Beating Retreat ceremony, marking the formal conclusion of the Republic Day festivities, will take place on 29/01/2025 at 18:00 hrs. Security measures will be heightened across the city from 20/01/25 onwards. The 'Bharat Parv' showcasing Indian culture and cuisine will be held from 26th Jan to 31st Jan, 11:00 AM to 10:00 PM daily at the Red Fort lawns.
normalised: The Beating Retreat ceremony, marking the formal conclusion of the Republic Day festivities, will take place on twenty ninth January two thousand and twenty five at eighteen zero zero hours. Security measures will be heightened across the city from twentieth January two thousand and twenty five onwards. The 'Bharat Parv' showcasing Indian culture and cuisine will be held from twenty sixth January to thirty first January, eleven zero zero A-M to ten zero zero P-M daily at the Red Fort lawns.

unnormalised: This year’s celebrations will also commemorate the 75th year of the Constitution. The official invites for the dignitaries will be dispatched by 15/12/2024. Further details regarding road closures and traffic diversions will be released by the Delhi Traffic Police by 10/01/2025.
normalised: This year’s celebrations will also commemorate the seventy fifth year of the Constitution. The official invites for the dignitaries will be dispatched by fifteenth December two thousand and twenty four. Further details regarding road closures and traffic diversions will be released by the Delhi Traffic Police by tenth January two thousand and twenty five.
